title: Integrable system on minimal nilpotent orbit
abstract:
We show that for every complex simple Lie algebra, the equations of Schubert
divisors on the flag variety give a complete integrable system of the minimal
nilpotent orbit. The approach is motivated by the integrable system on Coulomb
branch. We give explicit computations of these Hamiltonian functions, using
Chevalley basis and a so-called Heisenberg algebra basis. For classical Lie
algebras we rediscover the lower order terms of the celebrated Gelfand-Zeitlin
system. For exceptional types we computed the number of Hamiltonian functions
associated to each vertex of Dynkin diagram. They should be regarded as analogs
of Gelfand-Zeitlin functions on exceptional type Lie algebras.
